argument.name: udf_code
argument.description: A character string that contains the Xbasic statements that define a function.

argument.name: variable_context
argument.description: A pointer to the variable namespace that defines the scope of the function.

page.description: Create a udf from the UDF script.
page.discussion: The UDF_DEFINE() function adds the Xbasic statements, which define a function, to the list of UDFs in the specified variable namespace.
page.example: <%A5 dim functionDefString as c functionDefString = <<%code% function myUdf1 as c (name as c ) myUdf1 = upper(name) end function %code% udf_define(functionDefString, global_variables() )
